column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////I'll start off by saying
column2: the wait is real at Malnati's! I arrived at quarter to 8pm on a Wednesday night needing just a seat for me. There was a 30 minute wait. Their process is innovative where you place your pizza order first while you wait
column3: and by the time you're seated your pizza should be ready because of the long cooking process of the crust and pizza.
